alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:11PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Adams and southeastern Washington Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 610 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Star Butte, or 12 miles northeast of Weiser, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Star Butte and Crane Creek Reservoir around 620 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
